metadata.name: Migrate Competency to Skill
metadata.shortDescription: Extract and migrate specific competency features from another branch and transform them into standalone skills
metadata.description: Automates the migration of competency features from another git branch and transforms them into standalone skills following OLAF skills architecture with full schema compliance validation.
objectives: Extract competency features from specified git branch with validation
Transform competency structure to skills architecture format
Generate schema-compliant skill manifest with complete BOM
Migrate and adapt all associated files (prompts, templates, tools, docs)
metadata.author: windsurf ai + p-square

technical_requirements.tool_dependency: Git, file system access, JSON schema validation

prompts.name: migrate-competency-to-skill
prompts.description: Main migration workflow that extracts competency features and transforms them to skills
